data.title: Public Domain Information Project
data.meta_description: List of Public Domain Music and Songs | Royalty Free Music | How to Identify PD Songs | PD Sheet Music Reprints to Prove PD Status |  Music Copyright
data.text:
Public Domain Music

Music and lyrics published in 1928 or earlier are in the public domain in the USA.

No one can claim ownership of a song in the public domain, therefore public domain songs can be freely used with no fees or royalties payable to anyone. more ->

Proof of Public Domain

Any Sheet Music publication with a copyright date of 1928 or earlier will prove that a song is in the public domain in the USA.

You can find some 1928 or earlier sheet music in libraries and online . . . or you can order most any PD Reprint from us. more ->

Sound Recordings

Sound Recordings released in 1923 entered the public domain in the USA on January 1, 2023.

If you need a recording of a work published after 1923 you will either have to make your own recording or license a recording. Please check out our Royalty Free Music for your video project. more ->

Royalty Free Music

Here at PD Info you can quickly license professional Sound Recordings for your multimedia project.

Orchestra, Jazz, Hip-Hop, Piano, Acoustic Guitar . . . whatever background music you need. License one time and use the track for any multimedia project you create for the rest of your life. What a deal! more ->

United States Copyright

Information on PD Info is based on US Copyright Law where copyright protection is measured from the publication date of a musical work.

Virtually every country other than the USA measures copyright protection from the year of death of the last surving author. more ->

International Copyright

There is no such thing as "International Copyright". You must comply with the copyright laws of each separate country where you use music or lyrics.

Copyright protection in most countries other than the USA expires 70 years after the death of the last surviving author. In Canada, copyright protection expires 50 years after the death of all authors. more ->
